modelÔÉÅ

class model.model.Model(symbols, bounds=(0.0, 1.0), min_weight=0.0, margin_rate=0.0, long_weight=1.0, short_weight=0.0, frequency=252, optimization_method='mean_variance', risk_method='sample_cov', semivariance_benchmark=0, historical_prices=None, beta=0.95)ÔÉÅ

Bases: object

Description:

Class for the portfolio modeling.

Parameters:

  • symbols (list, required) ‚Äì List of symbols

  • bounds (tuple, optional) ‚Äì Bounds for long and short weights, default is (0.0, 1.0)

  • min_weight (float, optional) ‚Äì Minimum weight, default is 0.0

  • margin_rate (float, optional) ‚Äì Margin rate, default is 0.0

  • long_weight (float, optional) ‚Äì Long weight, default is 1.0

  • short_weight (float, optional) ‚Äì Short weight, default is 0.0

  • frequency (int, optional) ‚Äì Frequency, default is 252

  • optimization_method (str, optional) ‚Äì Method, default is ‚Äòmean_variance‚Äô. Options are ‚Äòmean_variance‚Äô, ‚Äòsemivariance‚Äô, ‚Äòcvar‚Äô, ‚Äòcdar‚Äô

  • risk_method (str, optional) ‚Äì Risk model, default is ‚Äòsample_cov‚Äô. Options are ‚Äòsample_cov‚Äô, ‚Äòsemicovariance‚Äô, ‚Äòexp_cov‚Äô, ‚Äòledoit_wolf‚Äô, ‚Äòledoit_wolf_constant_variance‚Äô, ledoit_wolf_single_factor, ledoit_wolf_constant_correlation, ‚Äòoracle_approximating‚Äô

  • semivariance_benchmark (int, optional) ‚Äì The return threshold to distinguish ‚Äúdownside‚Äù and ‚Äúupside‚Äù. Default is 0

  • historical_prices (pandas.core.frame.DataFrame, optional) ‚Äì Historical prices, default is None

  • beta (float, optional) ‚Äì Confidence level (e.g., expected loss on the worst (1-beta) days). Default is 0.95

calculate_black_litterman(covariance_matrix, market_prices, risk_free_rate, market_caps, symbols, investor_views, confidences, prints=False)ÔÉÅ
Description:

Calculate Black-Litterman

Parameters:

  • covariance_matrix (pandas.core.frame.DataFrame, required) ‚Äì Covariance matrix

  • market_prices (pandas.core.series.Series, required) ‚Äì Market prices

  • risk_free_rate (float, required) ‚Äì Risk free rate

  • market_caps (pandas.core.series.Series, required) ‚Äì Market capitalization

  • symbols (list, required) ‚Äì Symbols

  • investor_views (dict, required) ‚Äì Investor views

  • confidences (pandas.core.series.Series, required) ‚Äì Confidences

  • prints (bool, optional) ‚Äì Prints, default is False

Returns:

posterior covariance matrix, posterior expected returns

Return type:

tuple
